ch0133_10_shilver/0101_0701_02_10:
If you’ve got time, you’d better do some special
training... If you don’t want me to leave you in
the dust, that is.
ch0133_10_shilver/7101_0701_01_10: Do you know what it means to be strong?
ch0133_10_shilver/7101_0701_02_10:
It means fighting alongside your Pokémon—and
not being overconfident in your own skills.
ch0133_10_shilver/7101_0701_03_10:
A long time ago, I used to think only weaklings
put their trust in their Pokémon during battle.
ch0133_10_shilver/7102_0701_01_10:
When I’m with Sneasel, there are times when I
feel like we really understand each other.
ch0133_10_shilver/7102_0701_02_10:
Maybe that’s what people call a “bond...”
I think it is, anyway.
ch0133_10_shilver/7102_0701_03_10: Sneasel has helped me realize a lot of things.
ch0133_10_shilver/7103_0701_01_10: Hmph! Sygna suits are—surprisingly—not too bad.
ch0133_10_shilver/7103_0701_02_10: These outfits’ designs are based on Pokémon...
ch0133_10_shilver/7103_0701_03_10:
Maybe if I battle wearing this, I’ll understand
Pokémon’s feelings better than before.
ch0133_10_shilver/7104_0701_01_10:
I bet that guy Blue acts like your mentor or
something, trying to teach you all kinds of stuff.
He does the same with me.
ch0133_10_shilver/7104_0701_02_10:
If he does, you’re better off doing what he says
and picking up on his technique and his moves...
ch0133_10_shilver/7104_0701_03_10:
Take it in and get stronger—until the day you’re
strong enough to surpass him!
ch0133_10_shilver/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... You’re always so
smiley and cheerful around me.
ch0133_10_shilver/7105_0701_02_10: Hmph. Enjoy that while it lasts.
ch0133_10_shilver/7105_0701_03_10:
When the time comes for us to battle, I’m going
to beat you. And I won’t show any mercy!
ch0133_10_shilver/1701_0701_01_10:
I’m gonna be mad if I beat you only to find out it’s
because you weren’t prepared...
ch0133_10_shilver/1701_0702_01_10: You’d better make good use of it.
ch0133_10_shilver/2501_0701_01_10:
Wild Sneasel live in and around Mt. Silver, which
is between the Kanto and Johto regions.
ch0133_10_shilver/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s an unforgiving environment, with lots of very
powerful Pokémon. But even there, Sneasel
manage to survive.
ch0133_10_shilver/2501_0701_03_10: Maybe I could learn something from them...
ch0133_10_shilver/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve heard that Sneasel live in harsh conditions in
other regions too.
ch0133_10_shilver/2501_0702_02_10:
If I come across anyone who seems to know more,
maybe I’ll ask.
ch0133_10_shilver/2511_0701_01_10:
Just when I think I’ve gotten away from you,
Ethan, and the others... Before I know it,
you’re hanging around me again.
ch0133_10_shilver/2511_0701_02_10:
Even though I have no interest in teaming up with
anyone...you all just do whatever you want,
don’t you.
ch0133_10_shilver/2511_0701_03_10:
If someone nearby saw us, they might think I was
teamed up with you.
ch0133_10_shilver/2511_0702_01_10:
Battling alongside others can bring out more
power in people.
ch0133_10_shilver/2511_0702_02_10:
It’s completely against my philosophy, but teaming
up with others can lead to greater strength...
ch0133_10_shilver/2511_0702_03_10:
Tch! I’m not good enough yet to get stronger by
teaming up.
ch0133_10_shilver/3001_0701_01_10: Nighttime is over... Ready to battle me?
ch0133_10_shilver/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey. If you’ve got time, battle me. Let’s see how
our training’s paid off.
ch0133_10_shilver/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s dark out... Does that help you chill and be
a little less noisy?
